name: Pet World (SPACE UPDATE)
description:
Pet world is an idle game where you get pets, generate money, and buy upgrades. Help is found in the game by pressing the help button. 

Here's the link to the project on scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/758533347/

What did 1.8 Add?

 - New Music

 - New Egg

 - New Inspiration (lol)
